name: Rocket Turtle
description:
Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 88: Rush

Download and controller recommended (web build inputs tend not to work)

At one of the most beautiful moments of her life, a turtle realizes that she forgets something pivotal at home. After a long crawl back home and a pivotal item stored in her shell, she finds that she will never make it back in time for the incredibly important event. It's time to break out the old jetpack.

Explore the many branching paths of Rocket Beach as you race back to your very important event before it's too late. Use all of the tools at your disposal, drifting around tight corners, knocking away nasty crabs, and boosting off ramps, to reach your goal as fast as possible. There are also some weird token things scattered about. Why don't you collect those too. I'm sure those at your very important event would love them. 

(A time of 1:30 results in the "best" ending/turtle ranking. Each additional 30 seconds decreases this rank by 1).

My best time: 1:28.48

A game by Nicholas Soares
